data.title: Viy, Spirit of Evil 1980s Russian B1
data.meta_description: Viy, Spirit of Evil was one of very, very few Soviet horror films. This re-release poster is from the 1980s when the film started receiving renewed interest abroad.
data.text:
English title: Viy, Spirit of Evil

Poster title: Viy

Poster Year: 1980s

Poster Origin: Russian

Size: B1 25x39" (65x98cm)

Style: English export re-release

Film title: Вий

Film Year: 1967

Film Origin: Soviet Union

Film Directors: Konstantin Ershov Georgiy Kropachyov

Film Actors: Leonid KuravlyovNatalya VarleyAleksey GlazyrinNikolay Kutuzov

Film Genres: Drama| Fantasy| Horror

Film Plot: A young priest is ordered to preside over the wake of witch in a small old wooden church of a remote village. This means spending three nights alone with the corpse with only his faith to protect him.

Categories: Bold ColorsCultFilm

Keywords: 1960s1980sbatblueeyesghostsmonstermouthredscream

Grade: C7 Fine to Very Fine. Folded, single-sided. Theater-used poster with minor handling/surface/fold wear. Would grade higher if not for an accumulation of small flaws including light corner creases, wear along the tri-folds including ink loss and some general handling wear.

Framing: List prices are for posters only. Please inquire to discuss framing options.
